verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4031>Magog<s%>, the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H7218>Rosh<s%>, <S%H4902>Meshech<s%>, and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>, and prophesy against <S%H5012>him<s%>,

and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1463>Behold<s%>, I am against thee, O Gog, <S%H7218>prince<s%> of <S%H7218>Rosh<s%>, <S%H4902>Meshech<s%>, and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>:

and I will turn thee <S%H7725>about<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> into thy <S%H3895>jaws<s%>, and I will bring thee <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and all thine <S%H2428>army<s%>, <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, all of them <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H4358>full<s%> <S%H7227>armor<s%>, a great <S%H6951>company<s%> with <S%H6793>buckler<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%>, all of them <S%H8610>handling<s%> <S%H2719>swords<s%>;
Persia <S%H6539><s%>, <S%H3568>Cush<s%>, and <S%H6316>Put<s%> with <S%H4043>them<s%>, all of them with shield and <S%H3553>helmet<s%>;

Gomer <S%H1586><s%>, and all his <S%H102>hordes<s%>; the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%> in the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and all his <S%H102>hordes<s%>; even <S%H7227>many<s%> peoples with <S%H5971>thee<s%>.
Be thou <S%H3559>prepared<s%>, <S%H3559>yea<s%>, prepare <S%H6951>thyself<s%>, thou, and all thy companies that are <S%H6950>assembled<s%> unto <S%H4929>thee<s%>, and be thou a guard unto them.

After <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt be <S%H6485>visited<s%>: in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> that is brought <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, that is <S%H6908>gathered<s%> out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which have been a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>; but it is brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%>, all of them.

And thou shalt <S%H5927>ascend<s%>, thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> like a <S%H7722>storm<s%>, thou shalt be like a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H102>thou<s%>, and all thy hordes, and <S%H7227>many<s%> peoples with <S%H5971>thee<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: It shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H1697>things<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> into thy <S%H3824>mind<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H2803>devise<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4284>device<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of unwalled <S%H6519>villages<s%>; I will <S%H935>go<s%> to them that are at <S%H8252>rest<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%>, all of them <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> without <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and having neither <S%H1280>bars<s%> nor <S%H1817>gates<s%>;

to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey<s%>; to <S%H7725>turn<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the waste <S%H2723>places<s%> that are now <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are <S%H622>gathered<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, that have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2872>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and <S%H1719>Dedan<s%>, and the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, with all the young <S%H3715>lions<s%> <S%H559>thereof<s%>, shall say unto <S%H935>thee<s%>, Art thou come to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>? hast thou <S%H6950>assembled<s%> thy <S%H6951>company<s%> to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey<s%>? to carry <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, to take <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods<s%>, to <S%H7997>take<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%>?

Therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> when my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%>, shalt thou not know <S%H3045>it<s%>?

And thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> from thy <S%H4725>place<s%> out of the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H7227>thou<s%>, and many <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H7392>thee<s%>, all of them riding upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> and a <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>;

and thou shalt come <S%H5927>up<s%> against my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: it shall come to pass in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee against my <S%H776>land<s%>, that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H6942>me<s%>, when I shall be sanctified in <S%H1463>thee<s%>, O Gog, before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Art thou he of whom I <S%H1696>spake<s%> in <S%H6931>old<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in those <S%H3117>days<s%> for many <S%H8141>years<s%> that I would bring thee against <S%H935>them<s%>?

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, that my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> into my <S%H639>nostrils<s%>.

For in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, Surely in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>shaking<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

so that the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and all creeping <S%H7431>things<s%> that <S%H7430>creep<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and all the <S%H120>men<s%> that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>, shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be thrown <S%H2040>down<s%>, and the steep <S%H4095>places<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and every <S%H2346>wall<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> against him unto all my <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be against his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and with <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with <S%H4305>him<s%>; and I will rain upon <S%H102>him<s%>, and upon his hordes, and upon the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that are with <S%H7857>him<s%>, an overflowing <S%H1653>shower<s%>, and great <S%H417>hailstones<s%>, <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>.

And I will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> <S%H6942>myself<s%>, and sanctify <S%H3045>myself<s%>, and I will make myself known in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
